name: SSF2
title: Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Nuclear NM23 Staining
notes:
**Note 1:**  The NM23 gene located on chromosome 17 encodes the protein nucleoside diphosphate kinase. The presence of nuclear NM23 protein may be a good marker for predicting the metastatic potential of certain tumors. The value is expressed as the percentage of carcinoma cells in the tissue sample with positive nuclear staining for the NM23 protein.

**Note 2:**  Record whether nuclear NM23 staining is present as stated on the test report.
rows: Borderline; undetermined if positive or negative
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Test not done (test not ordered and not performed) No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
